ComicInfo.Title: Liberation #1
ComicInfo.Summary:
Titan’s smash-hit comic series is back for a second arc!
Aloy and Erend fend off deadly machines as the pair hunt down an Oseram tribe member’s killer!
Story by Horizon Zero Dawn narrative director Ben McCaw and writer Anne Toole, plus new series artist Elmer Damaso (Robotech).
